name: Pixel Wars (itch)
description: Pixel Wars is a real-time strategy game (RTS) that faces the player who by default controls a human faction against the machine that by default controls a horde of orcs. The player has to build and reinforce his city by collecting materials that are scattered all over the map, at the same time he must be creating small squadrons with which to explore the terrain to discover more zones of collection of resources, and to be able to finish quickly with the enemy explorers who warned their own army of the location of the infrastructures or armies of the player, thus provoking a great battle by the dominion of the territory.
